greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Binomial coefficients C(2n+1, n-2).
comment: a(n) is the number of royal paths (A006318) from (0,0) to (n,n) with exactly one diagonal step off the line y=x. - _David Callan_, Mar 25 2004
a(n) is the total number of DDUU's in all Dyck (n+2)-paths. - _David Scambler_, May 03 2013
reference: M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards Applied Math. Series 55, 1964 (and various reprintings), p. 828.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..1000
M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards, Applied Math. Series 55, Tenth Printing, 1972 [alternative scanned copy].
Heidi Goodson, An Identity for Vertically Aligned Entries in Pascal's Triangle, arXiv:1901.08653 [math.CO], 2019.

Asamoah Nkwanta and Earl R. Barnes, Two Catalan-type Riordan Arrays and their Connections to the Chebyshev Polynomials of the First Kind, Journal of Integer Sequences, Article 12.3.3, 2012. - From _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 16 2012
Daniel W. Stasiuk, An Enumeration Problem for Sequences of n-ary Trees Arising from Algebraic Operads, Master's Thesis, University of Saskatchewan-Saskatoon (2018).
formula: G.f.: x^2*c(x)^5/sqrt(1-4*x) = ((-1 + 2*x) + (1 - 3*x + x^2) * c(x))/(x^2*sqrt(1-4*x)), with c(x) the o.g.f. of the Catalan numbers A000108. See the W. Lang link under A115139 for powers of c. - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Sep 10 2016
mathematica: CoefficientList[ Series[ 32/(((Sqrt[1 - 4 x] + 1)^5)*Sqrt[1 - 4 x]), {x, 0, 25}], x] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 08 2011 *)
program: (Sage) [binomial(2*n+1, n-2) for n in (2..25)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 21 2019
(GAP) List([2..25], n-> Binomial(2*n+1, n-2)) # _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 21 2019
xref: Third unsigned column (s=2) of A113187. - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Oct 18 2012
Cf. triangle A114492 - Dyck paths with k DDUU's.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
